segments.text: Good morning madam . What can I get you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d like a coffee please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly madam , what kind of coffee would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well we have espresso , cappuccino , latte , skinny latte or Americano .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Goodness me ! What a choice ! I think I ’ ll have a cappuccino please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . You ’ ll find the sugar just over there .
segments.speaker: S1
